Header: German Chancellor Angela Merkel and several German politicians, hacked
Content: Colombo (News 1st) – German Chancellor Angela Merkel’s and several other German politicians and media figures personal data has been hacked and was published on Twitter. This incident is reported to have been the biggest data dump in the country. It is also reported that contacts, photos of IDs, personal chat histories and financial details were published on Twitter. In addition, the only group of people whose personal data was untouched was the far-right (AFD) political party. The data was leaked by a twitter account named “GOd”.
